hero.title: Get Your Own Private AI Assistant
hero.subtitle: A localized "Jarvis" that actually understands your files and your intent. Far beyond web-based chatbots.

requirements.title: What You Need
requirements.item1: A Spare Windows or Mac Computer
requirements.item1_desc: That's it. We handle everything else.

services.title: What's Included
services.subtitle: ₱5,000 one-time service fee
services.service1_desc: I handle the backend, environment setup, database, and deployment. No technical knowledge required from you.
services.service2_desc: I'll guide you through setting up your OpenAI/Google API keys so your AI is connected to the best models available.
services.service3_desc: I'll configure the system based on your specific needs—business analysis, creative writing, or technical assistance.

pricing.label: Service Fee
pricing.description: Pay only after you see it working. API usage costs (tokens) are paid directly to OpenAI/Google based on your consumption.
pricing.guarantee: Pay After Service · See It Working First

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a 16-year veteran Product Manager (expat) currently living in Manila. I've been using OpenClaw to handle my entire development workflow—building websites and platforms without writing a single line of code.

contact.title: Ready to Level Up Your Productivity?

footer.text: Stop playing with basic chatbots. Get a real AI assistant that understands your work, your files, and your goals.

hero.title: Reconstruct your years of deep industry insights into digital skills, transforming professional wisdom into core tradable intellectual property for the AI era.
hero.subtitle: Here, personal intelligence is no longer an isolated experience; it becomes a global, value-adding nexus of wisdom that breaks knowledge boundaries through digital technology.
hero.tag1_desc: Built on standardized skill interface designs, ensuring your expertise seamlessly powers various mainstream AI Agents—publish once, deploy everywhere.
hero.tag2_desc: Leveraging a decentralized, minimalist transaction architecture, we minimize friction costs to near zero, ensuring the full value of your creation returns to you.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step1_desc: Activate your expert identity instantly via Google or GitHub. Configure your Crypto wallet address or QR code to ensure your earnings are secure, borderless, and delivered directly to you.
howItWorks.step2_desc: Transform your professional expertise into tangible AI skills (Prompts, Workflows, or Model Parameters). Use our intuitive editor to set your pricing, describe features, and upload your digital assets.
howItWorks.step3_desc: Once approved, your skills enter the MySkillStore library. Buyers pay you directly; once payment is confirmed, the system triggers delivery, realizing the true value of your digital copyright.
howItWorks.step4_desc: Grow your reputation and establish a premier professional brand. In this AI-driven future, turn your intellectual property into a 'value engine' that generates stable, long-term passive income.

footer.text: MySkillStore empowers everyone to create, submit, and sell exclusive industry skills. We are dedicated to helping you reconstruct fragmented wisdom into systematic digital property through digital copyright technology, bringing you long-term and substantial economic returns while leading the intelligent revolution.

delivery.autoDesc: File will be delivered automatically after payment confirmation

payment.instruction: Send exact amount to the wallet address below, then click confirm:

step1.title: Basic Information
step1.description: Tell us about your skill or product

step2.title: Pricing & Delivery
step2.description: Set your price and delivery method
step2.price_hint: You receive 100% - buyers pay you directly
step2.upload_hint: Drag and drop or click to upload
step2.preview_hint: Upload a preview image for your product

step3.title: Payment Setup
step3.info: Buyers will pay you directly using crypto. We never hold your funds - payments go straight to your wallet.
step3.wallet_hint: Enter your USDT/USDC wallet address (TRC20, BEP20, or ERC20)
step3.qr_hint: Upload your wallet QR code for easier payments

HelpCenter.title: Help Center
HelpCenter.subtitle: Frequently Asked Questions & Support
HelpCenter.q1: How do I register or log in?
HelpCenter.a1: Click the 'Login / Register' button in the top right corner to create a new account or sign in.
HelpCenter.q2: How do I create and publish my skill?
HelpCenter.a2: Log in, go to the 'Publish Skill' page, fill in the details, set your price, and upload your files.
HelpCenter.a3: We charge minimal fees to maximize creator earnings. Check the publish page for rates.
HelpCenter.a4: We support major cryptocurrencies like USDT/USDC. Buyers pay directly to your wallet.
HelpCenter.a5: We use blockchain technology for copyright verification and smart contracts for secure transactions.
HelpCenter.a6: For auto-delivery items, files are sent instantly after payment confirmation. For manual items, the seller will contact you via Telegram.
